file_content.text: Do you know when we can go back to our homes? I can't get a straight answer out of anybody.
How could this happen? Last month, I was president of the Makeb Mining Concern. Today, I'm... I don't know what I am.
I know you, sir. I worked at one of your mines last month. Can't say I liked the hours you made us pull.
But it doesn't matter if we can't go home, huh? Look, I'll let you know when I hear anything. I promise.
